posts.name: Chicken Quesadilla
posts.description: Chicken filled grilled tortilla, with cheddar cheese
posts.instructions: Grill the chicken. Then pan fry the onions, and peppers. Then assemble the Quesadilla, and grill till golden brown.
posts.ingredients: Chicken, Torilla, Onion, Pepper, Cheddar Cheese

posts.name: Steak Quesadilla
posts.description: Steak filled grilled tortilla, with cheddar cheese
posts.instructions: Grill the steak. Then pan fry the onions, and peppers. Then assemble the Quesadilla, and grill till golden brown.
posts.ingredients: Steak, Torilla, Onion, Pepper, Cheddar Cheese
